maml:description.maml:para: Adds computer names to the tab expansion database.
You can pipe a DirectoryEntry to Add-TabExpansionComputer to store all computer names that are a part of an OU in the tab expansion database.
Adds an item to the tab expansion database.
Add type names from an assembly to the tab expansion database.
You can pipe an Assembly to Add-TabExpansionType to store all type names from the assembly in the tab expansion database.
Saves the current PowerTab configuration to a file.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to Export-TabExpansionConfig.
Saves the tab expansion database to a file.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to Export-TabExpansionDatabase.
Saves the current PowerTab color theme to a file.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to Export-TabExpansionTheme.
Gets items available in the tab expansion database.
Loads the PowerTab configuration from a file.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to Import-TabExpansionConfig.
Loads the tab expansion database from a file.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to Import-TabExpansionDatabase.
Loads a PowerTab color theme from a file.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to Import-TabExpansionTheme.
Opens a user interface for editing the tab expansion database.
Replaces the PowerTab configuration with default values.
You can pipe a string that contains a path to New-TabExpansionConfig.
Replaces the tab expansion database with a new clear database.
Registers a handler to take part in tab expansion of parameters and parameter values.
You can pipe a hashtable that contains keys named "Name" or "Handler to Register-TabExpansion.
Removes all stored computer names from the tab expansion database.
Removes items from the tab expansion database.
Updates the tab expansion database with fresh lists of items.
Updates the tab expansion database with a fresh list of type names.
Updates the tab expansion database with a fresh list of COM ProgIDs.
Updates the tab expansion database with a fresh list of WMI class names.
